document.full_text: the president has tried to create an image of forcefulness after the killing of osama bin laden as a way to help his re-election, in marked contrast to his more dovish rhetoric as a presidential candidate.
document.title: politicus: for obama, a victory but little clarity
lines_and_colors: the president has tried to create an image of forcefulness after the killing of osama bin laden as a way to help his re-election, in marked contrast to his more dovish rhetoric as a presidential candidate.
